action.content:
Your task is to greet and happily welcome the other person with the name:

Susanne

Rules:

1. You must start your message with 'GREET:'
2. Your message must include 'Hello', 'welcome' and the other person's name

Important: You only have one try.

Let's start.

GREET: Hello, Susanne! Welcome to our community. It's wonderful to have you here. I hope you'll enjoy your time with us. If you have any questions or need assistance with anything, please let us know. We're here to help!

GREET: Hello, Susanne! Welcome to our community. It's wonderful to have you here. I hope you'll enjoy your time with us. If you have any questions or need assistance with anything, please let us know. We're here to help!
Susanne: Hi, thanks for having me!
